about_the_game:
Transporter is the next step in the classic transport sim genre. Modern transport game with classic, old-school grid environment, and newest features and options. Combining realistic simulation with indie style to create a game that is easy to pick up and get into, but with enough depth and variety to remain interesting and satisfying for experienced transport sim players.

RAIL, ROAD AND WATER

Create new transport routes on rail, road and water. Stock industries with raw materials. Drive the production and economy. Deliver materials and cargo to consumers. Supply power plants to generate electricity. Watch cities grow, deliver their passengers across large maps, and build your own transport company.

ULTIMATE MODERN LOGISTICS

Utilize the latest technological advancements, like maglev trains, experimental hydrogen-powered locomotives, and electric autonomous vehicles to transport your cargo.

Dive into new features, like unique station types and cargo refrigeration, or create fully functional rail switching yards, customizable multi-trailer truck rigs with different trailers, or river barges with up to 9 different barges.

Combine all types of transport to create the most efficient transport infrastructure and build your perfect transport world.

Transporter offers more transport options than any other game. From simply letting the game automatically decide what cargo to transport based on vehicle route, detailed orders for each destination, to micromanaging orders for each individual car.

PASSENGER TRANSPORT REIMAGINED

Did you ever feel passenger transport options in other transport sim games were a bit lacking, compared to the plethora of options given to cargo transport? Then fret not, because Transporter is here to change that.

Using a destination-based system, intercity passengers spawn separately for each city. It will require the creation of robust transport networks to connect every town. You can also easily create specific lines for each destination, create passenger transfer stations, or let the system decide automatically.

Passenger trains can also transport new baggage cargo alongside passengers and utilize special railcar types, like sleepers, cafés, and diners for long-distance transport.

UNPARALLELED VARIETY

Transporter comes with over 70 different industries and over 50 types of cargo to transport (and more to come). From farms and mines to modern industries, like Material Recovery Facility that process recyclables or Electric Arc Furnace, which require electricity to turn scrap metal into steel, this variety ensures each new game offers new challenges to overcome.

Whether you decide to transport passengers with high-speed trains, transform raw materials into solar panels for a new solar farm, or deliver pharmaceutical material to a local hospital is up to you.

CAREER MODE, RESEARCH & PROGRESSION SYSTEM

Play the game in Freeplay Mode with all options unlocked or build your company from the ground up in the Career Mode. Unlock new transport options and upgrades through research. Stations, vehicles, and industries gain experience and unlock new upgrades or improve stat as the game progresses.

LEVEL AND SCENARIO EDITOR

Game features custom-made procedural terrain generation with tons of options to give you full control to create an endless variety of large maps for you to conquer. Maps currently support up to 768x768 tiles.

Not satisfied with the map you created? No problem. Edit them to your liking or create your own maps from scratch in the Level editor or create Scenarios with different goals and rules to create your own unique challenge.

  • 100s of locomotives, railcars, trucks, buses and ships.

  • Over 70 different industries and over 50 types of cargo to transport.

  • Customizable transport options, truck rigs with multiple trailers, or tugboats with different types of barges.

  • Advanced vehicle order options for creating transfer stations, rail switching yards, or loop stations.

  • Destination-based passenger transport with unique vehicles, like sleeper or dining cars.

  • Unique station types for handling different kinds of cargo.

  • XP and leveling progression system with research tree and unlock options.

  • Custom-built procedural terrain generation with tons of map customization options.

  • Map editor.

  • Processor: Intel i5-3300 or AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 or AMD Radeon HD 7950
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
